title: South African National Parks opens bookings for visits during June-July 2016
text:
South African National Parks opens bookings for visits during June-July 2016 Published on : Thursday, July 23, 2015
South African National Parks (SANParks) has opened bookings for visits during next year’s June-July holiday period to the various national parks under its management.
Bookings opened on Wednesday at SANParks’ call centres and email bookings while online bookings open on Thursday23 July 2015.
SANParks’ General Manager for Media, Events & Stakeholder Relations, Reynold Thakhuli, said the reason for opening both months at the same time is to make it easy for customers to book their holiday accommodation and activities well in advance as well as allowing them to plan their itinerary with just one booking, unlike in previous years when they had to book separately for June and July.
“Accommodation bookings in various national parks are always in demand during this peak winter school holiday period, which often leaves holiday makers disappointed for not securing the desired accommodation as these are popular destinations,” said Thakhuli.
Thakhuli stressed that holiday makers must be mindful that available inventory in all parks will be made available on a first-come, first-serve basis.
Visitors will be required to make the first deposit of 50 per cent 30 days after the booking has been made while the second deposit of 50 per cent must be paid 60 days before arrival.
